name: GOLDEN EAGLE CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BUREAU OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Golden Eagle Construction Co. v. Commonwealth

parties: GOLDEN EAGLE CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BUREAU OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of October, 2003, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
834 A.2d 1103
GOLDEN EAGLE CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BUREAU OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.
